pe5:9.1: Paññā ca sati ca nāmarūpassa kho tassa bhagavantaṁ puṭṭhumāgamma katthetaṁ upasammati → paññā ceva sati ca, iccāyasmā ajito nāmarūpaṁ ca mārisa; etaṁ me puṭṭho pabrūhi, katthetaṁ uparujjhati. (si)
pe5:17.1: “Yo ve na byathati → na vedhati (si), na byāthati (mr)
pe5:27.14: Navavidhaṁ mānaṁ mānassa → navavidhaṁ mānaṁ vidhāmānassa (bj); nava mānaṁ vidhamānassa (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
pe5:45.3: hoti, no vāgataṁ na paribhāsati → no vā na paribhāsati (pts-vp-pli1); na tāvāyaṁ paribhāsi (mr)
pe5:74.5: Yathā kiṁ, yā bhikkhūnaṁ → yo bhikkhu (bj); yā bhikkhu (pts-vp-pli1) | vattato → nivattato (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
pe5:78.1: hāravibhaṅgo nāma → etthantare pāṭho si potthake atthi
